Package imagingbook.common.color.sets

Interface ColorEnumeration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAwtColor, CssColor, RalColor
    public interface ColorEnumeration
    Interface used for color enum types.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Color getColor()
      Returns the enum item's Color.
      static Color[] getColors​(ColorEnumeration... cols)
      Returns an array of colors for the specified ColorEnumeration items.
      static Color[] getColors​(Class<? extends ColorEnumeration> clazz)
      Returns an array of colors defined by the specified ColorEnumeration enum class.

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        Color getColor()
        Returns the enum item's Color.
        Returns:
        the item's AWT Color

      • getColors

        static Color[] getColors​(Class<? extends ColorEnumeration> clazz)
        Returns an array of colors defined by the specified ColorEnumeration enum class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - a ColorEnumeration enum class
        Returns:
        a Color array

      • getColors

        static Color[] getColors​(ColorEnumeration... cols)
        Returns an array of colors for the specified ColorEnumeration items.
        Parameters:
        cols - a sequence of ColorEnumeration items
        Returns:
        a Color array
